wikipedia_page.main: Major Richard Burnard Munday was an English flying ace credited with scoring nine aerial victories during World War I. He was notable for scoring Britain's first night victory; he also excelled as a balloon buster at the rare feat of shooting down enemy observation balloons at night.

response: | Richard Burnard MundayShores et al. 1990, p. 287.
* Richard Burnard Munday (1896-1932), World War I flying ace
